newsitem.title: USA: Tracker Marine to acquire Mako Marine.
newsitem.headline: Tracker Marine to acquire Mako Marine.

text.p: Tracker Marine LP said Friday that TRACKAQ Inc, a wholly owned subsidiary of Tracker, adopted a plan to merge into Mako Marine International Inc.
TRACKAQ is the owner of 7.3 million shares of Mako common stock, representing about 80.9 percent of the outstanding shares.

Under the merger plan, the public shareholders of Mako will receive $1.25 in cash for each Mako common share they own, and holders of public warrants will receive $.125 in cash for each warrant they own, Tracker Marine said.

The merger plan also provides for the payment of cash consideration to holders of the other outstanding Mako warrants and options. Upon consummation of the proposed merger, Mako will become a wholly owned subsidiary of Tracker, Tracker said.
